I pity the fool who actually payed money for this game. The production value is so low this game is packed with bugs. Getting stuck in the most unimaginable places is common. They havnt even bothered to animate the pedestrians who's all stuck in the middle of a stride. There is also no learning process for the gameplay, so you'll have to jump into options constantly just to see how to play the damn game. You can even clearly hear when the ambient soundscape is looping! 

Even if you think it might appeal to you playing a game about driving a bus, you're bound to be disappointed with this one. You would think such a game would be simple enough to make, but apparently not when everything is done on the cheap.
